content: Hello! Win a FREE gift card now! Just reply YES to claim your prize.
Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can we assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Reply YES for exclusive deals! Lowest prices on everything! Act now!
It appears your message is not related to our home services. If you have any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs, please let us know.
reason: Customer sent unsolicited promotional messages unrelated to our business.
